results.title: Lisinopril in elderly patients with hypertension.
results.text_hl: One @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was withdrawn from the study because of @DISEASE_Angina_Unstable @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@, and another was discontinued from @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment because of @<m>DISEASE_Anorexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000855 @@@anorexia@@@ and @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@facial flushing@@@.

citations.NLM: Laher MS, Natin D, Rao SK, Jones RW, Carr P. Lisinopril in elderly patients with hypertension. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1987;9 Suppl 3():S69-71. PMID: 2442557
citations.BibTeX: @article{2442557, title={Lisinopril in elderly patients with hypertension.}, author={Laher MS and Natin D and Rao SK and Jones RW and Carr P}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={9 Suppl 3}, pages={S69-71}}

results.title: An Unusual Cause of Anaemia of Chronic Disease: Lisinopril-Induced Chronic Inflammatory State
results.text_hl: We report the case of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with severe systemic symptoms (@DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, malaise, and @<m>DISEASE_Anorexia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000855 @@@anorexia@@@), @DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@eosinophilic oesophagitis@@@, and raised @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ markers coinciding with the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Eyre T, Van-Hamel-Parsons V, Wang LM, Hughes KA, Littlewood TJ. An Unusual Cause of Anaemia of Chronic Disease: Lisinopril-Induced Chronic Inflammatory State Case Rep Hematol. 2011;2011():939080. PMID: 22937315
